Jekyll on Cloud Foundry

Sep 17, 2017

This is a basic Jekyll static website that is deployed using Cloud Foundry. All it takes is a simple cf push of this site’s Github repo to get started.

If you’re interested in learning more, check out my tutorial for deploying a static site with CloudFlare SSL using Cloud Foundry.
